text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a SECCONOBS

name: SecurityControlObservationType
title: SecurityControlObservationType
description: Type of security metadata observation made about the control of an IT resource (data, information object, service, or system capability), which may be used to make access control decisions. Security control metadata conveys instructions for secure distribution, transmission, storage or use.
